ARABIC: فَقَالَ لَهُمْ رَسُولُ ٱللَّهِ نَاقَةَ ٱللَّهِ وَسُقْيَٰهَا

ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_0: and the Messenger of Allah had said to them, 'This is the she-camel of Allah, so let her drink!'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_1: And the apostle of God had to tell them: "This is God's she-camel, let her drink."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_2: Then Allah's Messenger warned them: “Hands off the she-camel and her drink!”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_3: The Messenger of God told them, "This is a she-camel, belonging to God. Do not deprive her of her share of water".
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_4: So the Noble Messenger of Allah said to them, “Stay away from the she camel of Allah, and from its turn to drink.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_5: But the Messenger of Allah said to them: "Be cautious! That is the she-camel of Allah! (Do not harm it) and (bar it not from having) its drink!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_6: So Allah's apostle said to them (Leave alone) Allah's she-camel, and (give) her (to) drink.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_7: then the Messenger of God said to them, 'The She-camel of God; let her drink!'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_8: And the messenger of Allah said: It is the she-camel of Allah, so let her drink!
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_9: Then the messenger of God said to them, "This is God's she-camel. Let her drink."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_10: Then the apostle of Allah said Unto them: beware of the she-camel of Allah and her drink.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_11: The apostle of Allah had told them, ‘This is Allah’s she-camel, let her drink!’
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_12: But the Messenger of Allah said to them: "It is a She-camel of Allah! And (bar her not from) having her drink!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_13: But the Messenger of Allah [Salih (Saleh)] said to them: "Be cautious! Fear the evil end. That is the she-camel of Allah! (Do not harm it) and bar it not from having its drink!"
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_14: the Messenger of Allah said to them: '(This is) the shecamel of Allah, let her drink'
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_15: The messenger of God said to them, “This is the she-camel of God, so let her drink.”
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_16: And the messenger of Allah [Salih] said to them, "[Do not harm] the she-camel of Allah or [prevent her from] her drink."
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_17: [91:13] But then the messenger of God, Sālih, said to them, ‘[This is] the she-camel of God, so let her have her drink!’, her drink on her day — one day was hers, the next theirs.
ENGLISH.TRANSLATION_18: (And the messenger of Allah) Salih (said) that is before they hamstrung the she-camel: (It is the she-camel of Allah) leave the she-camel of Allah alone, (so let her drink!) i.e. and let her drink in peace!
